descriptionHtml:
A humble offering from me.

Soft Requirement (They are the basis of this preset choice)
1) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]Enhanced Lighting for ENB[/url]
2) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17609/?]Relighting Skyrim[/url] 
3) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?]Purity[/url]

Optional
1) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]Dynavision[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60097/?]optional static mode patch[/url] since this preset doesnt utilized DoF setting (Its too costly)

Installation guide
1) Remove any ENB files from skyrim folder if you are using them.
2) Install reshade files from [url=http://reshade.me]reshade.me[/url] .. Currently on offer is version 1.1.0 
3) Try running skyrim once, at the main screen at the beginning, you should see if reshade is installed correctly for skyrim if it managed to compiled.
4) Download this file.. you'll have to manually extract them into skyrim main folder, if reshade is installed correctly, it should warn you that it want to overwrite some files.. allow them.
5) Enjoy your skyrim with this preset.. send screenshots.

Tips:
You can toggle the effect on/off by using screenlock button ( near your printscreen button )
Additionally, gaussian blur can also be optionally toggled on/off with F11. (default is on with the other effect)


[b].::CREDIT::.[/b]
crosire and team, for reshade
Gamwich, for his texture mods, which I used most of them
Requiem team, Xarrian and now ogerboss, for they make Skyrim a better game overall.
and Bethesda.. for all the good time back from Arena and Daggerfall till Skyrim.
author: Deane
